name: part_011
file: tmp_【#マリン出航3DLIVE】ゲストとワイワイ！Marine Set Sail!! Concert!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [vLGCYbnYhPg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Music video section for the song 'Marine Set Sail!!'.
Transition screen and song title display.
3D Live performance of 'Marine Set Sail!!' by Houshou Marine.

subtitles.original: 取り戻すこと誓う
subtitles.english: I swear to take it back.

subtitles.english: Let there be light. Raise the flag of courage

subtitles.original: 旅立とう 嵐の海
subtitles.english: and let's set sail into the stormy sea.

subtitles.english: Stand up. Happiness isn't so cheap

subtitles.english: that you can get it just by wishing.

subtitles.english: If you fight to protect,

subtitles.original: 海賊となればいい
subtitles.english: then you should become a pirate.

subtitles.original: 22時プレミア公開!
subtitles.english: Premiere at 22:00!

subtitles.original: マリン出航!!
subtitles.english: Marine Set Sail!!

subtitles.original: 世界が壊れてゆく
subtitles.english: The world was breaking,

subtitles.original: 泣き声が聞こえていた
subtitles.english: I could hear the crying voices.

subtitles.original: 汚れた拳 痛むほど
subtitles.english: I clenched my stained fists

subtitles.original: 強く握った
subtitles.english: so tight it hurt.

subtitles.original: 当たり前に笑っていた
subtitles.english: Yesterday, when we laughed

subtitles.original: 昨日はもう どこにもない
subtitles.english: as a matter of course, is nowhere to be found.

subtitles.original: 明日がどんな日になるのか
subtitles.english: No one knows

subtitles.original: 誰も知らない
subtitles.english: what kind of day tomorrow will be.

subtitles.original: 正義にさえ 捨てられた今日
subtitles.english: Today, even abandoned by justice,

subtitles.original: 取り戻すこと誓う
subtitles.english: I swear to take it back.

subtitles.original: 光りあれ 勇気の旗掲げて
subtitles.english: Let there be light. Raise the flag of courage

subtitles.original: 旅立とう 嵐の海
subtitles.english: and let's set sail into the stormy sea.

subtitles.original: 立ち上がれ 幸せは願えば
subtitles.english: Stand up. Happiness isn't so cheap

subtitles.original: 手に入るほど 安くはない
subtitles.english: that you can get it just by wishing.

subtitles.original: 守るために戦うなら
subtitles.english: If you fight to protect,

subtitles.original: 海賊となればいい
subtitles.english: then you should become a pirate.

subtitles.original: 幸せは簡単に
subtitles.english: Happiness easily

subtitles.original: 灰の中消えてしまう
subtitles.english: vanishes into ashes.

subtitles.original: 奇跡をただ見てることが
subtitles.english: If you can't forgive yourself

subtitles.original: 許せないなら
subtitles.english: for just watching the miracle...

subtitles.original: 一人きりで震えていた
subtitles.english: The weak self that was trembling

subtitles.original: 弱い自分 消えはしない
subtitles.english: all alone won't disappear.

subtitles.original: それでも決意胸にだけは
subtitles.english: But with determination in my heart,

subtitles.original: もう迷わない
subtitles.english: I will no longer hesitate.

subtitles.original: 道半ばで 倒れた友に
subtitles.english: To the friend who fell halfway...

subtitles.original: 託された言葉抱き
subtitles.english: Clutching the words entrusted to me.

subtitles.original: 光りあれ 自由の旗掲げて
subtitles.english: Let there be light. Raise the flag of freedom

subtitles.original: 進め 大海原
subtitles.english: and advance into the great ocean.

subtitles.original: 燃え上がれ どんな雨だろうと
subtitles.english: Burn up. No matter what kind of rain it is,

subtitles.original: 消えることなき 火になれ
subtitles.english: become a fire that never goes out.

subtitles.english: If you fight to protect,

subtitles.english: then you should become a pirate.

subtitles.english: Yo ho ho, hello hey.

subtitles.english: At the chime of the dawn of victory,

subtitles.english: stand up!
